author: "Llull, Ramon, 1232?-1316"
title: "Raymundi Lullij Opera ea quae ad adinuentam ab ipso artem vniuersalem, scientiarum artiumque omnium breui compendio, firmaque memoria appraehendendarum, locupletissimaque vel oratione ex tempore pertractandarum, pertinent. Vt et in eandem quorundam interp"
